Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
public class Game
extends Observable
Represents a single match. This is a Model wrapper class.

    • changeTurn

      public void changeTurn()
      Manage the identification of the next current player. Check for blocked workers and eventually declare the defeat of a stuck player.

    • setLoser

      public void setLoser​(Player loser)
      Remove a player that has been defeated from the game by:
      • Removing his/her worker
      • Calling Card specific removal routine
      • Shrieking the players list
      Parameters:
      loser - The player that has lost

    • chooseCard

      public void chooseCard​(Player owner, EGodPower card)
      Creates and set the chosen Card to the Player
      Parameters:
      owner - The player that will be linked to the card
      card - The god related to the card

    • setFirstPlayer

      public void setFirstPlayer​(Player firstPlayer)

    • placeWorker

      public void placeWorker​(Player player, int workerId, Tile tileToPlaceWorker)
      Place the Worker to the specified Tile. This is not a movement.
      Parameters:
      player - The player that owns the worker
      workerId - Worker's unique ID
      tileToPlaceWorker - The Tile where the worker will be placed onto

    • pickChallenger

      public void pickChallenger()
      Chose the challenger amongst the players. The choice is done randomly.

    • pickCards

      public void pickCards​(EGodPower selectedCard)
      The challenger is choosing which card will be present in this game. We check the validity of the choice and communicate it.
      Parameters:
      selectedCard - A chosen Card

    • dealCards

      public void dealCards​(EGodPower selectedCard)
      Each player is choosing a Card,from those chosen by the challenger, that will be their own during the game. We check the validity of the choice and communicate it.
      Parameters:
      selectedCard - A chosen Card

    • pickFirstPlayer

      public void pickFirstPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname)
      The challenger is indicating which player will start first.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The first player indicated by the challenger

    • placeFirstWorker

      public void placeFirstWorker​(Position placement)
      Each player has to place their Worker on the Board before the game can start.
      Parameters:
      placement - The position on the board where the worker will be placed.

    • placeSecondWorker

      public void placeSecondWorker​(Position placement)
      Each player has to place their Worker on the Board before the game can start.
      Parameters:
      placement - The position on the board where the worker will be placed.
